## Checklist
<!-- Mark completed items with [x] -->

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have run `cargo fmt` to format my code
- [ ] I have run `cargo clippy` and fixed all warnings
- [ ] My code compiles without errors (`cargo check`)

### Testing
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix/feature works
- [ ] All existing tests pass (`cargo test`)
- [ ] I have tested my changes locally

### Documentation
- [ ] I have updated relevant documentation
- [ ] I have added doc comments to public APIs
- [ ] My commit messages are clear and descriptive

### Security
- [ ] I have considered security implications of my changes
- [ ] No sensitive information is exposed in the code
